MESSAGE.JP: 目覚めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I woke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I woke up.

MESSAGE.JP: 全身を襲う痛み。
MESSAGE.EN: Pain wracked my entire body.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pain wracked my entire body.

MESSAGE.JP: 体を動かす。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to move.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to move.

MESSAGE.JP: どこが上で下だかもわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't tell which side was up or down.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't tell which side was up or down.

MESSAGE.JP: 指が動く。
MESSAGE.EN: I could move my fingers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could move my fingers.

MESSAGE.JP: …目に光が差し込んできた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...My eyes caught a light.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...My eyes caught a light.

MESSAGE.JP: 身を捩じらせて、そこまで這っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Twisting my body, I crawled toward it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Twisting my body, I crawled toward it.

MESSAGE.JP: 何か…色々な障害物がある。
MESSAGE.EN: There were... many obstacles in my way.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were... many obstacles in my way.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、視界がはっきりしない。
MESSAGE.EN: My vision still wasn't clear.
MESSAGE.Translation: My vision still wasn't clear.

MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝...Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝...Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すぐそばで声がした。鈴の声だ！
MESSAGE.EN: Someone called my name. It was Rin's voice!
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone called my name. It was Rin's voice!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、ここだ、僕はここだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, right here, I'm right here!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, right here, I'm right here!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 必死に伝えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I desperately called to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I desperately called to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を伸ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: I extended my arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I extended my arm.

MESSAGE.JP: ぱし。
MESSAGE.EN: *Grab*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Grab*.

MESSAGE.JP: それが合わさった。
MESSAGE.EN: We seized each other's hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: We seized each other's hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 温かい…。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hand was warm...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hand was warm...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「りき…からだがいたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki... My body hurts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki... My body hurts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕もだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So does mine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So does mine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 体を這わせて寄っていって、顔を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I crawled up to her and looked into her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I crawled up to her and looked into her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 懐かしいような鈴の顔だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like I was seeing her face for the first time after a long separation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like I was seeing her face for the first time after a long separation.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の手を取って、そこから這い出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Taking her by the hand, we crawled out of there together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Taking her by the hand, we crawled out of there together.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「戻ってきたんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We've come back here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We've come back here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ここは…どこだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Where... are we...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Where... are we...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We are...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「修学旅行の途中の道…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...at the bottom of the cliff...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...at the bottom of the cliff...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その崖の下だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Our bus fell down here in the middle of our field trip...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Our bus fell down here in the middle of our field trip...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 記憶が次々と蘇ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I regained one memory after another.
MESSAGE.Translation: I regained one memory after another.

MESSAGE.JP: あの、バスの中の騒ぎが克明に思い出される。
MESSAGE.EN: I could clearly remember how the events had unfolded inside the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could clearly remember how the events had unfolded inside the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: バスが何かにぶつかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It had crashed into something.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had crashed into something.

MESSAGE.JP: 激しく揺れ、生徒が右から左へ飛ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: The violent shaking had thrown classmates from right to left.
MESSAGE.Translation: The violent shaking had thrown classmates from right to left.

MESSAGE.JP: 全員がパニック状態。
MESSAGE.EN: Everybody had panicked.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everybody had panicked.

MESSAGE.JP: そして上下が入れ替わった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the next moment, the bus had turned upside down.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the next moment, the bus had turned upside down.

MESSAGE.JP: 天井が床になっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The floor became the ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: The floor became the ceiling.

MESSAGE.JP: そこで前に座っていた真人の顔が、すぐ正面に現れた。
MESSAGE.EN: And Masato, from the seat ahead of mine, had stood up right in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: And Masato, from the seat ahead of mine, had stood up right in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人が…助けてくれたんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato... He saved me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato... He saved me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴は…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about you, Rin...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about you, Rin...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「謙吾が…あたしに抱きついた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kengo... He came and hugged me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kengo... He came and hugged me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは…謙吾が助けてくれたんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... He saved you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... He saved you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうだったのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is that it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is that it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「立てる…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can you stand...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can you stand...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「わからない…やってみる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Not sure... I'll give it a try...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Not sure... I'll give it a try...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は痛む体にむち打ち、立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Bearing the pain, I wrenched myself upright.
MESSAGE.Translation: Bearing the pain, I wrenched myself upright.

MESSAGE.JP: どこもかしこも痛い…全身が悲鳴を上げている。
MESSAGE.EN: Every inch of my body hurt... My entire body was screaming in pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every inch of my body hurt... My entire body was screaming in pain.

MESSAGE.JP: それから、てこずっていた鈴の肩を抱き上げ、立たせてあげた。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I noticed Rin having a little trouble standing up on her own, so I helped her up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I noticed Rin having a little trouble standing up on her own, so I helped her up.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたり人の字のようにもたれ合って立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: We leaned against each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: We leaned against each other.

MESSAGE.JP: その眼前…
MESSAGE.EN: Right in front of our eyes...
MESSAGE.Translation: Right in front of our eyes...

MESSAGE.JP: いつか夢の中で見た、絶望の風景だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...lay the hopeless scene of my nightmares...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...lay the hopeless scene of my nightmares...

MESSAGE.JP: それを今現実のものとして突きつけられている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Now I was facing it unfiltered...
MESSAGE.Translation: Now I was facing it unfiltered...

MESSAGE.JP: 目を逸らしたい…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to look away...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to look away...

MESSAGE.JP: でも、みんながそこに居る。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't, because everyone else was in there.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't, because everyone else was in there.

MESSAGE.JP: 助けなきゃ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to help them out...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to help them out...

MESSAGE.JP: それともここからすぐ離れるべきか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Or should I leave here right away with Rin...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or should I leave here right away with Rin...?

MESSAGE.JP: よし、みんなを助けないと…。
MESSAGE.EN: We had to rescue them all...
MESSAGE.Translation: We had to rescue them all...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴！　大丈夫、みんなを助けよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin! We've got to help everyone out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin! We've got to help everyone out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あたりには石油のような臭いが立ち込めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: An oily smell hung in the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: An oily smell hung in the air.

MESSAGE.JP: 早く助けないと引火する危険がある！
MESSAGE.EN: If we didn't help them fast, there was a danger of the oil catching fire!
MESSAGE.Translation: If we didn't help them fast, there was a danger of the oil catching fire!

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、大破した前方部分からクラスメイトを引きずり出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I dragged a classmate out from the smashed-up front of the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: I dragged a classmate out from the smashed-up front of the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…くっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Ugh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Ugh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気絶した人間の体の重さに愕然とする。
MESSAGE.EN: The weight of a passed-out human being was surprisingly heavy.
MESSAGE.Translation: The weight of a passed-out human being was surprisingly heavy.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴もまごついて、僕をすがるように見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was also at a loss, looking at me worriedly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was also at a loss, looking at me worriedly.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間だけが過ぎていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: And time kept ticking by...
MESSAGE.Translation: And time kept ticking by...

MESSAGE.JP: 破裂音が響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: We heard a loud blast.
MESSAGE.Translation: We heard a loud blast.

MESSAGE.JP: バスの後ろから火の手が上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a fire blazing up out of the rear of the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a fire blazing up out of the rear of the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、どうしたらいいんだ…!?
MESSAGE.EN: Ugh, what should I do...!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Ugh, what should I do...!?

MESSAGE.JP: パニック状態に陥る。
MESSAGE.EN: I was totally panicking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was totally panicking.

MESSAGE.JP: ――くらり、と世界が揺れた。
MESSAGE.EN: ――The world shook.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――The world shook.

MESSAGE.JP: こんなタイミングで来るのか…
MESSAGE.EN: Why now, of all times...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why now, of all times...

MESSAGE.JP: 忌まわしき病気…
MESSAGE.EN: The hateful illness I had...
MESSAGE.Translation: The hateful illness I had...

MESSAGE.JP: ナルコレプシー…
MESSAGE.EN: narcolepsy...
MESSAGE.Translation: narcolepsy...

MESSAGE.JP: 薄れていく意識の中で、閃光と熱風が僕らを包んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even as my consciousness faded away, we were wrapped in a flash of hot wind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even as my consciousness faded away, we were wrapped in a flash of hot wind.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、白くなる。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything was simply turning white.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything was simply turning white.

MESSAGE.JP: 何も感じなくなって…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was losing all my senses...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was losing all my senses...

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ、冷静になれ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right, I had to stay cool.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right, I had to stay cool.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなはもう…
MESSAGE.EN: Anyone else...
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyone else...

MESSAGE.JP: 助からないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: was not gonna make it.
MESSAGE.Translation: was not gonna make it.

MESSAGE.JP: そのうち流れ出た燃料に引火し、燃え出す。
MESSAGE.EN: It was only a matter of time before the leaked oil caught fire.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was only a matter of time before the leaked oil caught fire.

MESSAGE.JP: ここら一帯は火の海と化す…。
MESSAGE.EN: This area was going to turn into a sea of flame...
MESSAGE.Translation: This area was going to turn into a sea of flame...

MESSAGE.JP: その前にできるだけ離れないと…。
MESSAGE.EN: Before that, we've got to get as far as we can.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before that, we've got to get as far as we can.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴を連れて、逃げるんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I've got to take Rin and run...
MESSAGE.Translation: I've got to take Rin and run...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いくよ…鈴…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin... Let's get going...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin... Let's get going...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その手を引いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I took her by the hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took her by the hand.

MESSAGE.JP: バスとは反対方向へ…。
MESSAGE.EN: And began running in the opposite direction from the bus...
MESSAGE.Translation: And began running in the opposite direction from the bus...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どこへっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Where...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Where...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「生きるんだ、僕たちは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're going to live...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're going to live...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「みんながっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Everyone is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Everyone is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 説明しても、鈴は納得しないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if I had explained, she wouldn't have accepted it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if I had explained, she wouldn't have accepted it.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は無言でその手を引き続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: So I just kept on walking in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I just kept on walking in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは生きるために、戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: We'd gotten back here in order to keep on living.
MESSAGE.Translation: We'd gotten back here in order to keep on living.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなからその強さをもらって。
MESSAGE.EN: They had all given us the strength to make it possible.
MESSAGE.Translation: They had all given us the strength to make it possible.

MESSAGE.JP: これが正しいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had made the right decision.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had made the right decision.

MESSAGE.JP: 右。
MESSAGE.EN: Right.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right.

MESSAGE.JP: 左。
MESSAGE.EN: Left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Left.

MESSAGE.JP: 右。
MESSAGE.EN: Right.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right.

MESSAGE.JP: 左。
MESSAGE.EN: Left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Left.

MESSAGE.JP: 一歩ずつ歩を進める。
MESSAGE.EN: Taking one step after another, we moved.
MESSAGE.Translation: Taking one step after another, we moved.

MESSAGE.JP: その場所を後に、鈴を連れて歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Having left the scene of the accident, I was walking by Rin's side.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having left the scene of the accident, I was walking by Rin's side.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ…恭介。
MESSAGE.EN: But... Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: But... Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: ごめん…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sorry...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sorry...

MESSAGE.JP: 涙は止めようもないよ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I just can't stop crying...
MESSAGE.Translation: I just can't stop crying...

MESSAGE.JP: これだけは許してほしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: Please forgive me...
MESSAGE.Translation: Please forgive me...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は僕が守るから…。
MESSAGE.EN: I will protect Rin...
MESSAGE.Translation: I will protect Rin...

MESSAGE.JP: 守り続けるから…。
MESSAGE.EN: I will protect her till the end of time...
MESSAGE.Translation: I will protect her till the end of time...

MESSAGE.JP: ふわりと体の力が抜ける。
MESSAGE.EN: All of a sudden, my legs went weak.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of a sudden, my legs went weak.

MESSAGE.JP: そうか…こんな時に訪れるのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Wow... I never expected that it would hit now, of all times...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wow... I never expected that it would hit now, of all times...

MESSAGE.JP: 忌まわしき病気…
MESSAGE.EN: The hateful illness I had...
MESSAGE.Translation: The hateful illness I had...

MESSAGE.JP: ナルコレプシー…
MESSAGE.EN: narcolepsy.
MESSAGE.Translation: narcolepsy.

MESSAGE.JP: なるほど…
MESSAGE.EN: I see...
MESSAGE.Translation: I see...

MESSAGE.JP: もし僕があの場で助けにいったり、悩んだりしていたら…
MESSAGE.EN: If I had ventured into the bus or kept hesitating back there...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I had ventured into the bus or kept hesitating back there...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕まで倒れてしまって…
MESSAGE.EN: I would have ended up falling asleep...
MESSAGE.Translation: I would have ended up falling asleep...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴ひとりではどうすることもできなくて…
MESSAGE.EN: Rin wouldn't have been able to figure out what to do...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin wouldn't have been able to figure out what to do...

MESSAGE.JP: 一緒に火に飲まれていたんだな…。
MESSAGE.EN: We'd both have been surrounded by fire...
MESSAGE.Translation: We'd both have been surrounded by fire...

MESSAGE.JP: 一直線にここまでこれて、よかった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank god that we had made it straight here...
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank god that we had made it straight here...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴を連れてこれてよかった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm glad I was able to bring Rin here with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm glad I was able to bring Rin here with me.

MESSAGE.JP: ここまできたなら、大丈夫かな。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if we're safe here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if we're safe here.

MESSAGE.JP: もう、十分離れたかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if we're far enough from the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if we're far enough from the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「りきっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は大丈夫…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm fine...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm fine...

MESSAGE.JP: いつものだよ、鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: It's just the same as usual, Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's just the same as usual, Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 次目覚めたのは白い世界だ。
MESSAGE.EN: When I opened my eyes, I found myself in a white world.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I opened my eyes, I found myself in a white world.

MESSAGE.JP: いつか見た世界だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: This was a white which I'd seen before...
MESSAGE.Translation: This was a white which I'd seen before...

MESSAGE.JP: それは遠い記憶の中にあって、うまくは解けてくれなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The memory of it was too old for me to recall clearly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The memory of it was too old for me to recall clearly.

MESSAGE.JP: 点滴を打たれている。
MESSAGE.EN: I was on a drip.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was on a drip.

MESSAGE.JP: 次目覚めたのは白い世界だ。
MESSAGE.EN: When I opened my eyes, I found myself in a white world.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I opened my eyes, I found myself in a white world.

MESSAGE.JP: いろんな世界があるんだな…。
MESSAGE.EN: There sure were a lot of different worlds...
MESSAGE.Translation: There sure were a lot of different worlds...

MESSAGE.JP: …天井か。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I saw a ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I saw a ceiling.

MESSAGE.JP: 白い天井…。
MESSAGE.EN: A white ceiling...
MESSAGE.Translation: A white ceiling...

MESSAGE.JP: 右手が痛む…。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a pain in my right arm...
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a pain in my right arm...

MESSAGE.JP: 持ち上げて見てみると、管が刺さっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I brought it up and found a needle in it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I brought it up and found a needle in it.

MESSAGE.JP: 点滴…。
MESSAGE.EN: A drip...
MESSAGE.Translation: A drip...

MESSAGE.JP: 病院か…。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently this was a hospital...
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently this was a hospital...

MESSAGE.JP: ベッドで寝てるんだな、僕は…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was lying in bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was lying in bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は…？
MESSAGE.EN: Where is Rin...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where is Rin...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin!❞

MESSAGE.JP: その名を呼んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I called out her name.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called out her name.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ここにいる…理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm right here... Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm right here... Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 隣から声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice came from beside me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice came from beside me.

MESSAGE.JP: その方向に顔を向けると、鈴が部屋の端でうずくまっているのが確認できた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned my eyes in that direction and found her crouching in the corner of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned my eyes in that direction and found her crouching in the corner of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank goodness...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank goodness...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は安心した。
MESSAGE.EN: I was relieved.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was relieved.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を繋ぎたいと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to hold her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to hold her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、起きあがることもできず、それはできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't, because I couldn't even sit up.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't, because I couldn't even sit up.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹はすごく寝ていたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You slept for so long.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You slept for so long.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「疲れてたんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was tired...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was tired...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いろいろがんばったから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because I worked really hard...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because I worked really hard...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴は怪我はなかったの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aren't you injured...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aren't you injured...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はその質問には答えない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't answer my question.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't answer my question.

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、ベッドに寝ていないわけだから、大丈夫だったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, she should be all right since she wasn't in bed.

MESSAGE.JP: あらたな世界へ。
MESSAGE.EN: into a whole new world.
MESSAGE.Translation: into a whole new world.

MESSAGE.JP: 目覚めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I woke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I woke up.

MESSAGE.JP: それはこの世に今、生まれ落ちたような生々しい感覚だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had this vivid feeling, like I had at this moment been born into this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had this vivid feeling, like I had at this moment been born into this world.

MESSAGE.JP: 今までいた世界とは違う。
MESSAGE.EN: A world different from the one I had been in.
MESSAGE.Translation: A world different from the one I had been in.

MESSAGE.JP: 全身を襲う痛み。
MESSAGE.EN: Pain wracked my entire body.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pain wracked my entire body.

MESSAGE.JP: その感覚だけですべてを実感した。
MESSAGE.EN: And the pain told me everything.
MESSAGE.Translation: And the pain told me everything.

MESSAGE.JP: これが本当の世界なんだと。
MESSAGE.EN: It told me I was back in the real world.
MESSAGE.Translation: It told me I was back in the real world.

MESSAGE.JP: 体を動かす。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to move.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to move.

MESSAGE.JP: どこが上で下だかもわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't tell which side was up or down.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't tell which side was up or down.

MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝...Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝...Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すぐそばで声がした。鈴の声だ！
MESSAGE.EN: Someone called my name. It was Rin's voice!
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone called my name. It was Rin's voice!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、ここだ、僕はここだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, right here, I'm right here!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, right here, I'm right here!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 必死に伝えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I desperately called to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I desperately called to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を伸ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: I extended my arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I extended my arm.

MESSAGE.JP: ぱし。
MESSAGE.EN: *Grab*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Grab*.

MESSAGE.JP: それが合わさった。
MESSAGE.EN: We seized each other's hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: We seized each other's hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 温かい…。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hand was warm...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hand was warm...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「りき…からだがいたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki... My body hurts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki... My body hurts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕もだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So does mine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So does mine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 体を這わせて寄っていって、顔を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I crawled up to her and looked into her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I crawled up to her and looked into her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 懐かしいような鈴の顔だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like I was seeing her face for the first time after a long separation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like I was seeing her face for the first time after a long separation.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の手を取って、そこから這い出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Taking her by the hand, we crawled out of there together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Taking her by the hand, we crawled out of there together.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「戻ってきたんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We've come back here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We've come back here...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ここは修学旅行の途中の道…その崖の下。
MESSAGE.EN: We had fallen down onto the bottom of this cliff... in the middle of our field trip.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had fallen down onto the bottom of this cliff... in the middle of our field trip.

MESSAGE.JP: 記憶が次々と蘇ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I regained one memory after another.
MESSAGE.Translation: I regained one memory after another.

MESSAGE.JP: あの、バスの中の騒ぎが克明に思い出される。
MESSAGE.EN: I could clearly remember how the events had unfolded inside the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could clearly remember how the events had unfolded inside the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: バスが何かにぶつかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It had crashed into something.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had crashed into something.

MESSAGE.JP: 激しく揺れ、生徒が右から左へ飛ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: The violent shaking had thrown classmates from right to left.
MESSAGE.Translation: The violent shaking had thrown classmates from right to left.

MESSAGE.JP: 全員がパニック状態。
MESSAGE.EN: Everybody had panicked.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everybody had panicked.

MESSAGE.JP: そして上下が入れ替わった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the next moment, the bus had turned upside down.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the next moment, the bus had turned upside down.

MESSAGE.JP: 天井が床になっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The floor became the ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: The floor became the ceiling.

MESSAGE.JP: そこで前に座っていた真人の顔が、すぐ正面に現れた。
MESSAGE.EN: And Masato, from the seat ahead of mine, had stood up right in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: And Masato, from the seat ahead of mine, had stood up right in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕を庇ってくれたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He had saved me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had saved me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は謙吾に支えられていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo had shielded Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo had shielded Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: それで、ふたりともこうして助かった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was how the two of us had survived.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was how the two of us had survived.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふたりが助けてくれたんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Those two saved us...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Those two saved us...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「立てる…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can you stand...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can you stand...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「わからない…やってみる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Not sure... I'll give it a try...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Not sure... I'll give it a try...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は痛む体にむち打ち、立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Bearing the pain, I wrenched myself upright.
MESSAGE.Translation: Bearing the pain, I wrenched myself upright.

MESSAGE.JP: どこもかしこも痛い…全身が悲鳴を上げている。
MESSAGE.EN: Every inch of my body hurt... My entire body was screaming in pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every inch of my body hurt... My entire body was screaming in pain.

MESSAGE.JP: それから、てこずっていた鈴の肩を抱き上げ、立たせてあげた。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I noticed Rin having a little trouble standing up on her own, so I helped her up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I noticed Rin having a little trouble standing up on her own, so I helped her up.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたり人の字のようにもたれ合って立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: We leaned against each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: We leaned against each other.

MESSAGE.JP: その眼前…
MESSAGE.EN: Right in front of our eyes...
MESSAGE.Translation: Right in front of our eyes...

MESSAGE.JP: いつか夢の中で見た、絶望の風景だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...lay the hopeless scene of my nightmares...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...lay the hopeless scene of my nightmares...

MESSAGE.JP: それを今現実のものとして突きつけられている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Now I was facing it unfiltered...
MESSAGE.Translation: Now I was facing it unfiltered...

MESSAGE.JP: 目を逸らしたい…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to look away...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to look away...

MESSAGE.JP: でも、みんながそこに居る。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't, because everyone else was in there.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't, because everyone else was in there.

MESSAGE.JP: 助けなきゃ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to help them out...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to help them out...

MESSAGE.JP: ひとつ、ふたつ、深呼吸をする。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a deep breath. Another.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a deep breath. Another.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、みんなを助けなくてはいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to help them all out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to help them all out.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…どうした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっとだけ、待って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait just a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait just a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: せり上がってくる恐怖心を押さえ込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I suppressed the fear trying to force its way out from within me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suppressed the fear trying to force its way out from within me.

MESSAGE.JP: かすかにガソリンのような…燃料の匂いがする。
MESSAGE.EN: I faintly smelled... something like gasoline.
MESSAGE.Translation: I faintly smelled... something like gasoline.

MESSAGE.JP: このままだと爆発するのは明白だ。
MESSAGE.EN: At this rate, the bus was plainly going to end up exploding.
MESSAGE.Translation: At this rate, the bus was plainly going to end up exploding.

MESSAGE.JP: 貴重な時間だけど、冷静になるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was little time left, but I needed to use some of it to cool myself down.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was little time left, but I needed to use some of it to cool myself down.

MESSAGE.JP: 感情に絡め取られて、いいことなんかこれまでなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Getting swept away by emotion had never done me any good so far.
MESSAGE.Translation: Getting swept away by emotion had never done me any good so far.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度も経験してきたことじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: It was something I had experienced first hand countless times.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was something I had experienced first hand countless times.

MESSAGE.JP: それを活かせ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was time to learn from my mistakes.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was time to learn from my mistakes.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「みんなを助けるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're rescuing everybody.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're rescuing everybody.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、このままじゃ無理だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But we need a plan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But we need a plan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「考えるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We have to think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We have to think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、僕を信じて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, trust in me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, trust in me.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だいじょうぶだ、信じてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No worries, I trust you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No worries, I trust you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「警察に電話しないといけないんじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shouldn't we call the police?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shouldn't we call the police?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「機転が利くね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Great idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Great idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちゃんと説明できるよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can you explain things to them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can you explain things to them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は落ち着いて、１１０番通報をしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She called the emergency number level-headedly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She called the emergency number level-headedly.

MESSAGE.JP: ときどきつっかえたり、困っていた様子もあったが、頑張っている。大丈夫だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite stumbling over her words and having trouble figuring out what to say at times, she seemed to be doing well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite stumbling over her words and having trouble figuring out what to say at times, she seemed to be doing well.

MESSAGE.JP: いつか、みんなで他人に対する行儀を鈴に教えた記憶とだぶって見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: That reminded me of the time the four of us had taught her how to behave properly toward other people.
MESSAGE.Translation: That reminded me of the time the four of us had taught her how to behave properly toward other people.

MESSAGE.JP: それが何だったかはもう思い出せないけど、それは無駄じゃなかったんだ、と思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't remember any details, but I thought it had been worth it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't remember any details, but I thought it had been worth it.

MESSAGE.JP: さて、僕は僕のやるべきことがある。
MESSAGE.EN: Well then, I also had my own things to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well then, I also had my own things to do.

MESSAGE.JP: とにかく、みんなを助けないと…!!
MESSAGE.EN: I had to help everyone out...!!
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to help everyone out...!!

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は傷む身体に鞭打って、バスの様子を見に行く。
MESSAGE.EN: Forcing myself to bear all the pain in my body, I climbed inside the bus to see what it was like.
MESSAGE.Translation: Forcing myself to bear all the pain in my body, I climbed inside the bus to see what it was like.

MESSAGE.JP: …ひどい惨状だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What a horrible scene it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What a horrible scene it was.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（どうしたらいいんだ…!?）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(What should I do...!?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(What should I do...!?)

MESSAGE.JP: その状況を見て、さらに気が動転してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Recognizing the full extent of the situation made me even more agitated.
MESSAGE.Translation: Recognizing the full extent of the situation made me even more agitated.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（どうしよう…どうしよう…!!）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(What should I do... What should I do...!!)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(What should I do... What should I do...!!)

MESSAGE.JP: 考えなんてまとまらない!!
MESSAGE.EN: How could I come up with any ideas at a place like this!?
MESSAGE.Translation: How could I come up with any ideas at a place like this!?

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまずそこから離れて、息を落ち着かせることにした…。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to go outside for a moment to steady my breathing...
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to go outside for a moment to steady my breathing...

MESSAGE.JP: 痛む全身を堪えながら、太そうな枝に飛びついた。
MESSAGE.EN: Suppressing the pain, I jumped at a thick-looking branch.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suppressing the pain, I jumped at a thick-looking branch.

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま体重をかけて、根元から折る。
MESSAGE.EN: Hanging from it, my weight made it break off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hanging from it, my weight made it break off.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、もう一本。
MESSAGE.EN: I repeated this one more time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I repeated this one more time.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにやってんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What are you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What are you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 電話を終えたのだろう。鈴がそばまで寄ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin must have finished her call, as she came back to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin must have finished her call, as she came back to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「すぐわかるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You'll see soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You'll see soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小枝を打ち払い、一本の棒に仕立てる。
MESSAGE.EN: I snapped off the twigs to smoothen the branches.
MESSAGE.Translation: I snapped off the twigs to smoothen the branches.

MESSAGE.JP: 上着を脱いで、ボタンを留める。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I took off my jacket and fastened its buttons.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I took off my jacket and fastened its buttons.

MESSAGE.JP: 二本の棒に袖を通し、裾から出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I put the two branches into the sleeves and pushed them out of the hem.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put the two branches into the sleeves and pushed them out of the hem.

MESSAGE.JP: 裾をひっくり返し、袖にかぶせて強度を持たせる。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, I folded the hem and sleeves over to make the fabric thicker.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, I folded the hem and sleeves over to make the fabric thicker.

MESSAGE.JP: 上着がもう何枚か必要だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I needed a couple more jackets.
MESSAGE.Translation: I needed a couple more jackets.

MESSAGE.JP: 散らばった荷物からパーカーを借りて、同じように棒にかぶせた。
MESSAGE.EN: I found a sweater in someone's bag and pulled it over the branches as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found a sweater in someone's bag and pulled it over the branches as well.

MESSAGE.JP: さらにもう一枚。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I added one more.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I added one more.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よし、できた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, I'm done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, I'm done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、そっち持って！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, grab that side!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, grab that side!❞

MESSAGE.JP: この形を見ればもう何だかわかるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Now she could tell what I had made.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now she could tell what I had made.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がちりん、と頷き正面に回った。
MESSAGE.EN: With a chime of her bell, she moved to take the other side.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a chime of her bell, she moved to take the other side.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らはバスからクラスメイトを、二本の棒…即席の担架に乗せて運び出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Using the improvised stretcher... we carried one classmate after another out of the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: Using the improvised stretcher... we carried one classmate after another out of the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: バスは、フロントバンパーのところが最も酷く壊れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The front bumper of the bus had suffered the heaviest damage.
MESSAGE.Translation: The front bumper of the bus had suffered the heaviest damage.

MESSAGE.JP: 幸いにも客室内はそれほど壊れてなく、フロントガラスから中に入ることができた。
MESSAGE.EN: Fortunately the passenger compartment wasn't that badly messed up, so we could pass through the windshield.
MESSAGE.Translation: Fortunately the passenger compartment wasn't that badly messed up, so we could pass through the windshield.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、横倒しの車体なので、中を移動するのが難しい。運転席が天井となっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Although, since the bus was lying on its left side, it was not an easy task for us to move around inside the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although, since the bus was lying on its left side, it was not an easy task for us to move around inside the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: 運転席は潰れてしまって、奥の様子はわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: The driver's seat was crushed, and I couldn't see the situation behind it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The driver's seat was crushed, and I couldn't see the situation behind it.

MESSAGE.JP: 割れたガラスで怪我しないよう、ひとりずつ抱えて、外へと出していく。
MESSAGE.EN: Cautious of the shattered glass, we carried out one person at a time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Cautious of the shattered glass, we carried out one person at a time.

MESSAGE.JP: 担架に乗せ、全速力で離れた場所へと寝かせ、また戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: Placing one on the stretcher, carrying them away at full speed and then getting right back inside the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: Placing one on the stretcher, carrying them away at full speed and then getting right back inside the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ、とにかくみんなを中から出さないと。
MESSAGE.EN: The first thing I had to finish was getting them all out of the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: The first thing I had to finish was getting them all out of the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: 余計なことをしている場合じゃない、と判断し、バスへ向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no time to waste on anything unnecessary.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no time to waste on anything unnecessary.

MESSAGE.JP: 窓から、ひとりの生徒を引きずり出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I pulled a classmate out through a window.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pulled a classmate out through a window.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（くそっ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Dammit...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Dammit...)

MESSAGE.JP: 動けない人って、なんて重いんだ…!!
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't known how heavy an unconscious person could be...!
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't known how heavy an unconscious person could be...!

MESSAGE.JP: 肩に抱えて、遠くまで連れて行く。
MESSAGE.EN: Hoisting him on my shoulders, I took him away from the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hoisting him on my shoulders, I took him away from the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁっ、はぁっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hahh, haah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hahh, haah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 膝なんてついてる場合じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no time to rest.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no time to rest.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、身体はすぐに疲労してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: But my body was rapidly growing tired.
MESSAGE.Translation: But my body was rapidly growing tired.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「りきっ、早くっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, hurry!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, hurry!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 遠くから鈴の声が届く。
MESSAGE.EN: She was calling out to me from afar.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was calling out to me from afar.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うんっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …こんなに時間がかかるなんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I had spent so much time carrying just one single person here...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had spent so much time carrying just one single person here...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は思慮が足りていなかったことを悔いる。
MESSAGE.EN: I regretted how thoughtless I had been.
MESSAGE.Translation: I regretted how thoughtless I had been.

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ、枝を使って…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I should use thick branches to make...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I should use thick branches to make...

MESSAGE.JP: ふと、何かを引きずった跡を地面に見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly I saw dragging marks on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly I saw dragging marks on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 草は倒れ、黒ずんだ血で染まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: On the path of the trail, the grass was pressed down and dyed in blood.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the path of the trail, the grass was pressed down and dyed in blood.

MESSAGE.JP: それは横倒しになったバスの底面へと続いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The marks led me to the bottom of the upturned bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: The marks led me to the bottom of the upturned bus.

MESSAGE.JP: 辺りには燃料が漏れているのか油の匂いが漂い、まだ熱いエンジンを避けながら覗き込むと…
MESSAGE.EN: Smelling the source of leaked fuel or oil close by, I avoided the still hot engine and looked over it to find...
MESSAGE.Translation: Smelling the source of leaked fuel or oil close by, I avoided the still hot engine and looked over it to find...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこに恭介が居た。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke was there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke was there.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理不尽だ…なぜてめぇらだけ旅行で、俺だけ居残りなんだよぉぉ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Totally unacceptable... How come I'm gonna have to stay in school while you guys go on a field trip!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Totally unacceptable... How come I'm gonna have to stay in school while you guys go on a field trip!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは恭介が三年生で、一年前に行ってるし、目下就職活動中だからだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's because you're a third-year, had your field trip last year and are currently busy looking for a job.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's because you're a third-year, had your field trip last year and are currently busy looking for a job.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どっちかというと、完全におまえのほうが理不尽だぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If you ask me, YOU are what's unacceptable here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If you ask me, YOU are what's unacceptable here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「でもこいつの行動原理に言わせると、行かないわけにはいかないんだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But I'm pretty sure that following his principles, there's no way he'll just give up here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But I'm pretty sure that following his principles, there's no way he'll just give up here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「当然だ…修学旅行なんて楽しいことだらけじゃねぇか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Of course I won't... Field trips are way too much fun!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Of course I won't... Field trips are way too much fun!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「子供か、おまえは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Are you a child?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Are you a child?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介も乗り込んでいたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He had been on the bus also.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had been on the bus also.

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対どこかに隠れ潜んでいる…僕らはそう話し合いながらバスに乗っていたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We had suspected that he must have hidden himself somewhere on the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had suspected that he must have hidden himself somewhere on the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: そして今、白いシャツを鮮血に染め、バスの底、その中央部にもたれかかっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: And now he lay there, his white shirt soaked with blood, leaning against the center area of the bottom of the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: And now he lay there, his white shirt soaked with blood, leaning against the center area of the bottom of the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: なんてことだ…あんなに接して、熱いだろうに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why on earth was he there...? His back was on the hot engine...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why on earth was he there...? His back was on the hot engine...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は急いで駆け寄る。
MESSAGE.EN: I dashed up to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I dashed up to him.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大丈夫!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You all right!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You all right!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 体を揺するも返事はない！
MESSAGE.EN: I shook him, but there was no reply!
MESSAGE.Translation: I shook him, but there was no reply!

MESSAGE.JP: 胸に耳を当てると、弱々しく不揃いだが…鼓動はわずかに聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I put my ear onto his chest... It was weak and irregular, but his heart was still barely beating.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put my ear onto his chest... It was weak and irregular, but his heart was still barely beating.

MESSAGE.JP: 助けよう…背中に手を回したところで気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to help him... But just as I was about to slide my arm behind his back, I noticed something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to help him... But just as I was about to slide my arm behind his back, I noticed something.

MESSAGE.JP: その背面、接したバスの底から油が染みだし、地面を濡らしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was oil leaking out of the bus and making a pool on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was oil leaking out of the bus and making a pool on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は、バスの底に空いた穴をふさいでいるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He must have been blocking the hole with his body.
MESSAGE.Translation: He must have been blocking the hole with his body.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、腕を抜いて、その体を離した。
MESSAGE.EN: I withdrew my arm and released his body.
MESSAGE.Translation: I withdrew my arm and released his body.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は今もなお、こんな体でも…みんなを守り続けているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite being injured so severely... he was even now protecting us all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite being injured so severely... he was even now protecting us all.

MESSAGE.JP: その思いに応えるためにも、恭介は後回しにしてクラスメイトを助けなくちゃならない…！
MESSAGE.EN: I could not let his devotion go to waste; I had to rescue the other classmates before him...!
MESSAGE.Translation: I could not let his devotion go to waste; I had to rescue the other classmates before him...!

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は自分のシャツを切り裂いて、切れた額を覆うように縛った。
MESSAGE.EN: I ripped part of my shirt off and wrapped the strip around his bleeding forehead.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ripped part of my shirt off and wrapped the strip around his bleeding forehead.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介…絶対助けるから、待ってて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke... I'll be right back for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke... I'll be right back for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 感情に任せて、恭介に手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I reached toward him without another thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached toward him without another thought.

MESSAGE.JP: …僕は、忘れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I should have been aware
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I should have been aware

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が、なぜそこで…。
MESSAGE.EN: of why he was there...
MESSAGE.Translation: of why he was there...

MESSAGE.JP: その場所に、いなければならなかったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...why he had needed to be there.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...why he had needed to be there.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は、守っていたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He had been protecting us.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had been protecting us.

MESSAGE.JP: 灼熱から、僕たちを。
MESSAGE.EN: He had been protecting us from that inevitable flame.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had been protecting us from that inevitable flame.

MESSAGE.JP: …風が、吹いた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A wind blew.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A wind blew.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、視界は白くなり…。
MESSAGE.EN: And I could only see white...
MESSAGE.Translation: And I could only see white...

MESSAGE.JP: やっとバスの最後尾に着いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I eventually made it to the very rear of the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: I eventually made it to the very rear of the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐったりとして倒れているのは真人と謙吾。
MESSAGE.EN: There I found Masato and Kengo lying limp.
MESSAGE.Translation: There I found Masato and Kengo lying limp.

MESSAGE.JP: まずは上に乗っかっている謙吾を引っ張り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Since Kengo was atop Masato, I pulled him out first.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since Kengo was atop Masato, I pulled him out first.

MESSAGE.JP: 握力がなく、指を開くのに苦労する。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no strength in my fingers.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no strength in my fingers.

MESSAGE.JP: 過呼吸で全身が酸素を欲しがっている。
MESSAGE.EN: My entire body was shouting for oxygen.
MESSAGE.Translation: My entire body was shouting for oxygen.

MESSAGE.JP: 今すぐ座り込んで、そのまま倒れてしまいたいほどの疲労。
MESSAGE.EN: If I sat down now, I probably wouldn't be able to get up again.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I sat down now, I probably wouldn't be able to get up again.

MESSAGE.JP: そのすべてを奥歯で噛み潰し、気合とともに謙吾を担ぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: Clenching my teeth, I hoisted myself onto my feet with him on my shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: Clenching my teeth, I hoisted myself onto my feet with him on my shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うぁっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A... gh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A... gh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 反動で、背中をシートで打ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: My back screamed in protest.
MESSAGE.Translation: My back screamed in protest.

MESSAGE.JP: が、必死に堪える。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, I stood.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, I stood.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間がないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no time to waste.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no time to waste.

MESSAGE.JP: 進め。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to go forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to go forward.

MESSAGE.JP: 一歩ずつ。
MESSAGE.EN: One step after another.
MESSAGE.Translation: One step after another.

MESSAGE.JP: 可能な限りの速度で。
MESSAGE.EN: As fast as I could.
MESSAGE.Translation: As fast as I could.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなを助けるって、決めたんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because I had decided to rescue them all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because I had decided to rescue them all.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度目の往復になるだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: How many round-trips had I made so far...?
MESSAGE.Translation: How many round-trips had I made so far...?

MESSAGE.JP: もう数え切れない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't tell anymore...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't tell anymore...

MESSAGE.JP: バスの中から、最後の人を助け出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I helped the last one out of the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: I helped the last one out of the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…重いよ、こんなに無駄に筋肉つけて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You're so heavy. You've got too much muscle on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You're so heavy. You've got too much muscle on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気を失っている真人は答えない。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato didn't make any reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato didn't make any reply.

MESSAGE.JP: 何となくだけど苦笑が出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know why, but I couldn't help a laugh escaping my lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know why, but I couldn't help a laugh escaping my lips.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕より大きな体を必死に抱え、一歩ずつバスの外へ出る。
MESSAGE.EN: Holding his gigantic body on my back, I made my way out of the bus step by painstaking step.
MESSAGE.Translation: Holding his gigantic body on my back, I made my way out of the bus step by painstaking step.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「担架にのせるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Should we use the stretcher?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Should we use the stretcher?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…、真人は大きすぎるからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... It's too small for him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... It's too small for him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「このまま運んでいくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll just keep carrying him this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll just keep carrying him this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、バスの中から持ってきて欲しいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, there's something I need you to bring from the bus.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, there's something I need you to bring from the bus.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後部座席のほうから火柱が上がっている!!
MESSAGE.EN: There was a pillar of fire swirling up from the rear of the bus!!
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a pillar of fire swirling up from the rear of the bus!!

MESSAGE.JP: 引火したら終わりだ…もう時間がない…!!
MESSAGE.EN: If the oil caught the fire, we would all be done for... No time left...!!
MESSAGE.Translation: If the oil caught the fire, we would all be done for... No time left...!!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「えらいことになってるぞ、どうするんだ、理樹っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's getting a lot worse. What do we do, Riki!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's getting a lot worse. What do we do, Riki!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「荷物を調べてほしいんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I need you to look into the bags.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I need you to look into the bags.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何でもいいから、集めておいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Collect whatever you think is useful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Collect whatever you think is useful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 意味が通じたかはわからないが、鈴は頷いて、走っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't sure if she'd understood my purpose, but she nodded and ran off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't sure if she'd understood my purpose, but she nodded and ran off.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「荷物を調べてくれないかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can you look into the bags...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can you look into the bags...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「みんな、怪我してるから、添木になるものや、止血できそうな布」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Everybody's injured, so we need stuff that we can use as braces, or clothes to stop their bleeding.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Everybody's injured, so we need stuff that we can use as braces, or clothes to stop their bleeding.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何でもいいから、集めておいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Collect whatever you think is useful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Collect whatever you think is useful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちりん、とひとつ頷き、走っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: With a cling of the bell, she ran off.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a cling of the bell, she ran off.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は、先に意識を取り戻した比較的軽傷な同級生たちを叱咤激励し、荷物から取り出したタオルやシャツで治療を始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Some of the more lightly injured classmates had started to regain consciousness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some of the more lightly injured classmates had started to regain consciousness.

MESSAGE.JP: てきぱきと調べ、集めては女生徒のひとりに止血させている。
MESSAGE.EN: She quickly gathered more clothes while a female classmate treated the injured.
MESSAGE.Translation: She quickly gathered more clothes while a female classmate treated the injured.

MESSAGE.JP: 不安そうな顔もするけど、がんばって考えて、次の行動に移る。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though she occasionally wore a look of anxiety on her face, she tried hard to figure out what to do next and moved to action.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though she occasionally wore a look of anxiety on her face, she tried hard to figure out what to do next and moved to action.

MESSAGE.JP: 時には相談して、指示を仰ぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: She even asked me for advice every once in a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: She even asked me for advice every once in a while.

MESSAGE.JP: 昔では考えられないほど頼もしい姿だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd become far more reliable than she used to be.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd become far more reliable than she used to be.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「シートを取り外して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Take some of the seats off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Take some of the seats off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ベッド代わりになるはずだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I think we can use them as beds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I think we can use them as beds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: She got into the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: She got into the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: …けれど、シートはなかなか簡単には外れない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...However, it wasn't so easy to detach a seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...However, it wasn't so easy to detach a seat.

MESSAGE.JP: 怪我をしている人たちのために必要と、僕は判断した。
MESSAGE.EN: I had judged that the injured needed them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had judged that the injured needed them.

MESSAGE.JP: …けれど、そんなものよりもっと必要なものはいっぱいあった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But I realized that there were many other things they needed much more.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But I realized that there were many other things they needed much more.

MESSAGE.JP: 考えを改める。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人を少し離れた草むらに寝かせる。
MESSAGE.EN: We carried Masato to a grassy patch some distance away.
MESSAGE.Translation: We carried Masato to a grassy patch some distance away.

MESSAGE.JP: これでバスの中に居た全員を避難させた。
MESSAGE.EN: We'd gotten all the classmates out of the bus.
MESSAGE.Translation: We'd gotten all the classmates out of the bus.

MESSAGE.JP: 後は、最後に残された恭介だけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The only one left was Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: The only one left was Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: ようやくその目の前に戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: At long last, I had come back for him.
MESSAGE.Translation: At long last, I had come back for him.

MESSAGE.JP: だが、手遅れだったみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But it was already too late.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it was already too late.

MESSAGE.JP: もう何も見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't see anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't see anything.

MESSAGE.JP: すべては消し飛んだんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything was swept away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything was swept away.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も…恭介も…。
MESSAGE.EN: Me... and Kyousuke as well...
MESSAGE.Translation: Me... and Kyousuke as well...

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後部座席のほうから火柱が上がっている!!
MESSAGE.EN: There was a pillar of fire swirling up from the rear of the bus!!
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a pillar of fire swirling up from the rear of the bus!!

MESSAGE.JP: 引火したら終わりだ…もう時間がない…!!
MESSAGE.EN: If the oil caught the fire, we would all be done for... No time left...!!
MESSAGE.Translation: If the oil caught the fire, we would all be done for... No time left...!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!!❞

MESSAGE.EN: I reached toward him without another thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached toward him without another thought.

MESSAGE.JP: …僕は、忘れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I should have been aware
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I should have been aware

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が、なぜそこで…。
MESSAGE.EN: of why he was there...
MESSAGE.Translation: of why he was there...

MESSAGE.JP: その場所に、いなければならなかったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...why he had needed to be there.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...why he had needed to be there.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は、守っていたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He had been protecting us.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had been protecting us.

MESSAGE.JP: 灼熱から、僕たちを。
MESSAGE.EN: He had been protecting us from that inevitable flame.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had been protecting us from that inevitable flame.

MESSAGE.JP: …風が、吹いた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A wind blew.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A wind blew.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、視界は白くなり…。
MESSAGE.EN: And I could only see white...
MESSAGE.Translation: And I could only see white...

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ…！
MESSAGE.EN: That's right...!
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right...!

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は、爆発を防ぐために、身を挺しているんじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: He was using his own body to prevent an explosion.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was using his own body to prevent an explosion.

MESSAGE.JP: …ならば、代わりになるもので埋めなければ！
MESSAGE.EN: ...Therefore, I needed something to take his place!
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Therefore, I needed something to take his place!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（埋めるもの…!?）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(A replacement...!?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(A replacement...!?)

MESSAGE.JP: 上着は、さっき担架を作るときに使ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd already used my jacket to make the stretcher.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd already used my jacket to make the stretcher.

MESSAGE.JP: なんでもいい、僕たちが逃げおおせるまでの間、もてばいい…。
MESSAGE.EN: Anything would do as long as it could gain us the time to get far enough...
MESSAGE.Translation: Anything would do as long as it could gain us the time to get far enough...

MESSAGE.JP: 傍らを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked down.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked down.

MESSAGE.JP: …女子の制服の上着が、ガラスまみれで落ちていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There was a girl's jacket, covered in shards of glass from the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There was a girl's jacket, covered in shards of glass from the window.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、これでいいっ！
MESSAGE.EN: This would do!
MESSAGE.Translation: This would do!

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介をどかし、穴を塞ぐように、それを詰め込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I moved Kyousuke aside and stuffed the jacket into the hole.
MESSAGE.Translation: I moved Kyousuke aside and stuffed the jacket into the hole.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後部座席のほうから火柱が上がっている!!
MESSAGE.EN: There was a pillar of fire swirling up from the rear of the bus!!
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a pillar of fire swirling up from the rear of the bus!!

MESSAGE.JP: 引火したら終わりだ…もう時間がない…!!
MESSAGE.EN: If the oil caught fire, we would all be done for... No time left...!!
MESSAGE.Translation: If the oil caught fire, we would all be done for... No time left...!!

MESSAGE.JP: これで問題はないはずだ！
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I've done everything I need to!
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I've done everything I need to!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（まだなにか、やりのこしたことは…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Is there something I haven't done yet...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Is there something I haven't done yet...?)

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介を肩に抱えて、立ち止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped walking with Kyousuke on my shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped walking with Kyousuke on my shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: …そんなこと、してる場合じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...You don't have time for that.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...You don't have time for that.

MESSAGE.JP: 頭の中に声が響いた、気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like I heard someone say that inside my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like I heard someone say that inside my head.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の目の前で、塞いでいた上着が吹き飛ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw the wind blow the jacket away from the tank.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw the wind blow the jacket away from the tank.

MESSAGE.JP: …耳に、声が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I heard someone's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I heard someone's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の声だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps it was Rin's.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps it was Rin's.

MESSAGE.JP: だめだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't make it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't make it.

MESSAGE.JP: もう、遅かった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was too late.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was too late.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴だけでも…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin, even if it's just you...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin, even if it's just you...

MESSAGE.JP: ここから…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...get out of here...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...get out of here...

MESSAGE.JP: もう、だめだ。早く、逃げろ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's too late. Just run.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's too late. Just run.

MESSAGE.JP: 頭の中に声が響いた、気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like I heard someone say that inside my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like I heard someone say that inside my head.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …耳に、声が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I heard someone's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I heard someone's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の声だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps it was Rin's.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps it was Rin's.

MESSAGE.JP: だめだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't make it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't make it.

MESSAGE.JP: もう、遅かった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was too late.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was too late.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴だけでも…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin, even if it's just you...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin, even if it's just you...

MESSAGE.JP: ここから…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...get out of here...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...get out of here...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう、恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you, Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you, Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「みんな無事だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're all safe...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're all safe...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介の…おかげだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's... all thanks to you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's... all thanks to you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 呼吸も覚束ない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't even breathe normally...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't even breathe normally...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕にはまだ力が残っているのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Did I still have enough energy left within me...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did I still have enough energy left within me...?

MESSAGE.JP: それすら怪しい…。
MESSAGE.EN: I could no longer tell.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could no longer tell.

MESSAGE.JP: けど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Still...
MESSAGE.Translation: Still...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「最後は恭介の番だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's finally your turn, Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's finally your turn, Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介を抱きしめ…一気に持ち上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I put my arms around him and lifted him up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put my arms around him and lifted him up.

MESSAGE.JP: 上着で塞いでいた燃料タンクから、大量の軽油が一気に噴出する。
MESSAGE.EN: A large amount of oil instantly erupted from the tank his jacket had been covering.
MESSAGE.Translation: A large amount of oil instantly erupted from the tank his jacket had been covering.

MESSAGE.JP: …あの程度じゃ、長くもつわけはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The girl's jacket alone couldn't buy us much time.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The girl's jacket alone couldn't buy us much time.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴！　手を貸して！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin! Give me a hand!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin! Give me a hand!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「早くっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Quick!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Quick!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて駆けつけた鈴が、恭介を反対側から肩で背負う。
MESSAGE.EN: She rushed over to me and took Kyousuke's other shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: She rushed over to me and took Kyousuke's other shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「急いで離れるんだ！　爆発する！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We've got to hurry up and get out of here! It's gonna blow!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We've got to hurry up and get out of here! It's gonna blow!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろは振り返らない。
MESSAGE.EN: We didn't look back.
MESSAGE.Translation: We didn't look back.

MESSAGE.JP: ただまっすぐ…
MESSAGE.EN: Straight ahead...
MESSAGE.Translation: Straight ahead...

MESSAGE.JP: ひたすらまっすぐに…
MESSAGE.EN: We ran straight forward with everything we had...
MESSAGE.Translation: We ran straight forward with everything we had...

MESSAGE.JP: 世界が白く染まった。
MESSAGE.EN: The world became white.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world became white.

MESSAGE.JP: 轟音が熱風と共に襲いかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: A booming roar and fiery wind attacked us from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: A booming roar and fiery wind attacked us from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: とっさに身を翻し、鈴と恭介を庇う。
MESSAGE.EN: Instinctively, I flattened Rin and Kyousuke against the ground under me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Instinctively, I flattened Rin and Kyousuke against the ground under me.

MESSAGE.JP: 毛先を焼く臭いが鼻腔を刺し、一瞬息が出来なくなる。
MESSAGE.EN: The smell of my own hair burning filled my nose, and I could not breathe for a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: The smell of my own hair burning filled my nose, and I could not breathe for a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: 爆風で吹き飛ばされながら、僕は二人の体を離さなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though the blast hammered me, I kept holding on tight to the siblings.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though the blast hammered me, I kept holding on tight to the siblings.

MESSAGE.JP: もう、二度と離れない。
MESSAGE.EN: I won't let you go ever again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I won't let you go ever again.

MESSAGE.JP: 大丈夫だよ、もう。
MESSAGE.EN: It's going to be alright now.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's going to be alright now.
